subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The winner of the 2008 P.G.A. Championship, who has not won since, was one shot ahead of Tim Clark in the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational.
snippet: The winner of the 2008 P.G.A. Championship, who has not won since, was one shot ahead of Tim Clark in the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational.
